title: Design Thinking-Based OER Mathematics Innovation Project

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced studies and experience in executing high-level projects
context.additional_context: Project-based learning environment for enhancing mathematical problem-solving and innovation skills among office/administrative professionals in their 20s.

learning_goals: Learners can design mathematical models to solve real-life problems by applying the five stages of design thinking: empathize, define, ideate, prototype, and test.
Learners can perform data-driven decision-making processes with 80% accuracy by analyzing materials collected from OER platforms.
Learners can collaborate with team members using collaboration tools to develop mathematical problem-solving solutions and submit outcomes as digital portfolios.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
